332302715.name: Chuwi GemiBook Plus Intel Celeron N100 15.6 inch Full HD Laptop

details.description_text: 15.6 inch, 1920*1080P, 16:9 Intel N100, Quad Core Quad Thread, 0.8 to 3.4GHz, 7nm Intel UHD Graphics for 12th Gen Intel Processors 8GB LPDDR5 + 256GB SSD WiFi6 802.11ax & BT5.2 2.0M Front Camera Battery: 38Wh(7.6V/5000mAH), Backup time: 5.5 hours Windows 11 Home; Color: Grey Chuwi GemiBook Plus Intel Celeron N100 15.6 inch Full HD LaptopThe Chuwi GemiBook Plus is a powerful and spacious 15.6-inch Full HD laptop designed to provide an exceptional computing experience. With a 1920 x 1080P resolution and a 16:9 aspect ratio, this laptop provides an immersive visual experience for work, pleasure, and beyond. The Intel Celeron N100 CPU takes center stage under the hood, with a Quad Core Quad Thread arrangement working at clock speeds ranging from 0.8 to 3.4GHz on an efficient 7nm architecture. This assures smooth multitasking and quick performance, which is enhanced with Intel UHD Graphics designed for 12th Gen Intel Processors for clear, detailed images. With its combination of a large 256GB SSD and 8GB of LPDDR5 RAM, the GemiBook Plus offers customers plenty of storage space as well as quick access to data. With WiFi 6 (802.11ax) and Bluetooth 5.2, connectivity is excellent and provides fast wireless connections for a smooth online experience. The laptop's adaptability is increased by the 2.0M front camera, which qualifies it for virtual and video conferences. The laptop has 38Wh battery (7.6V/5000mAh) ensures a dependable backup time of around 5.5 hours, enabling productivity while on the road. It was designed with mobility in mind. The GemiBook Plus, running Windows 11 Home, has a cutting-edge and user-friendly interface that makes use of the newest features and security improvements. In conclusion, the Chuwi GemiBook Plus is a feature-rich laptop that shines in terms of connection, processing speed, display quality, and mobility. For those looking for a complete and effective computing solution, this laptop is a great option.

536005376.name: ASUS Vivobook Go 15 E1504GA-NJ231 Intel Core i3-N305 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop

details.description_text: Processor: Intel Core i3-N305 Processor RAM & Storage: 8GB DDR4, 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 3.0 SSD Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics Display: 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) Certifications: US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard ASUS Vivobook Go 15 E1504GA-NJ231 Intel Core i3-N305 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop is powered by an Intel Core i3-N305 Processor, offering efficient performance for everyday tasks. This processor can easily handle common tasks such as web browsing, document editing, and multimedia playback. It comes with 8GB DDR4 onboard. The laptop has a 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 3.0 SSD offering ample storage space for your files and documents. The Intel UHD Graphics Card ensures decent graphics performance for basic applications and multimedia. With a 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) 16:9 aspect ratio display, the laptop delivers vibrant visuals, a fuller viewing angle, and a wider color range. This display features 250 nits of brightness.For a long time, backup it has a 42WHrs, 3S1P, 3-cell Li-ion battery. You can enjoy your outdoor work or movie time without worrying about plugging the laptop into power. For better wireless connectivity, it has the latest Wi-Fi 6E(802.11ax) (Dual band) 1*1 + Bluetooth 5.3 Wireless Card (*Bluetooth version may change with OS version differences.). This laptop has a Built-in speaker and array microphone that provides a stunning audio experience. It has a variety of ports, including 1x USB 2.0 Type-A (data speed up to 480Mbps), 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A (data speed up to 5Gbps), 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C (data speed up to 5Gbps), 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack, 1x DC-in.The 720p HD camera with privacy shutter is ideal for video conferences and online classes. ASUS Vivobook Go 15 E1504GA-NJ231 is packed with many special features, such as a backlit chiclet keyboard that helps in low-light areas, and a Trusted Platform Module (Firmware TPM) that provides security against threats like firmware and ransomware attacks. This laptop comes with US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard certifications. Weighing in at only 1.63 kg (3.59 lbs), this is a lightweight laptop. This makes it very portable and easy to carry around. The Mixed Black of this laptop offers a sleek and stylish look. Box content includes a ø4.5, 45W AC Adapter, a Laptop, and a user manual. For peace of mind, Asus provides a 2-year brand warranty on laptops and a 1-year warranty on power adapters.

details.description_text: Processor Brand - Intel Processor Model - Core i5-13420H Processor Series - 13th Gen Processor Speed - 2.1GHz / up to 4.6GHz Number Of Cores - 8C Number Of Threads - 12T Cache - 12MB Memory Size - 16GB Memory Type - DDR4 Storage - 512GB Storage Type - M.2 x1 Type 2280 Key M SSD Screen Size - 14-inch Resolution - FHD (1920x1200) Brightness - 300nits Refresh Rate - 60Hz Display Details - sRGB 100%, 72% NTSC color gamut, Anti-glare display, Screen-to-body ratio 90% GPU Chipset - Intel UHD Graphics GPU Memory Type - Share Keyboard - Support 4 levels white backlight Touchpad - Yes Webcam - 2M webcam WiFi - Wifi 6E Bluetooth - v5.4 Built-in Mic - D-Mic x 2 Audio Technology - Supprot DTS X Ultra Built-in Speaker - Build-in two speakers (4Ω/2W) Audio codecs - Realtek ALC269QN-VC3-GR(VB6/VC3) Battery Type - 3 cells, Li-Polymer Battery capacity - 11.61V/ 6460mAh 75Wh Adapter - 65W (20V/3.25A) type-c with PD Ports - Type-C x2 (Charge&data&display), Speed 10Gbps, USB 3.1 x1 (Gen 2, speed 10Gbps), USB 3.0 x2 ( Gen1, speed 5Gbps), HDMI 1.4 x1. Operating System - FreeDOS Security Chip - Trusted Platform Module (Firmware TPM) Security Slot - Kensington Lock x1 Fingerprint - Yes Color - Space Grey Dimension - 314.6 *224.2*15.8mm Weight - 1.39Kg Warranty - 2 Years Service Warranty (Battery & Adapter 1 Year) Gift - Laptop Bag Tecno MEGABOOK T1 14 Core i5 13th Gen LaptopThe Tecno MEGABOOK T1 14 is a sleek and powerful laptop built for smooth performance, everyday productivity, and effortless multitasking. It is powered by the 13th Gen Intel Core i5-13420H processor, featuring 8 cores and 12 threads with speeds up to 4.6GHz. This makes it ideal for students, professionals, and anyone who needs fast and reliable computing on the go. With 16GB of LPDDR4 onboard RAM, the laptop offers seamless multitasking and fast app performance. The 512GB M.2 SSD ensures quick boot times, faster data access, and plenty of storage for documents, media, and software. The 14-inch Full HD display provides a crisp and vibrant viewing experience. It offers a 1920x1200 resolution, 300nits brightness, 100% sRGB color coverage, and a 72% NTSC colour gamut. The anti-glare panel and 90% screen-to-body ratio enhance your viewing comfort whether you're working or watching content. For graphics, the laptop comes with Intel UHD Graphics which handles everyday visuals and light creative tasks efficiently. The white backlit keyboard with four adjustable brightness levels lets you work comfortably in any lighting environment, while the smooth touchpad supports precise control. Connectivity is modern and fast with Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.4. You also get a wide range of ports including two USB Type-C ports with charging, data, and display support, one USB 3.1 Gen 2 port, two USB 3.0 ports, and an HDMI 1.4 output. The 2MP webcam makes video calls clear, and the dual microphones ensure crisp audio capture. The Tecno MEGABOOK T1 14 also offers impressive audio with DTS X Ultra technology, dual 2W speakers, and Realtek audio codecs. Its 75Wh battery provides long-lasting power, while the 65W Type-C adapter supports fast charging with Power Delivery. Security features include a fingerprint reader, Firmware TPM, and a Kensington lock slot. The slim and lightweight design in stylish Space Grey, weighing only 1.39kg and measuring just 15.8mm thin, makes it easy to carry wherever you go. Preloaded with FreeDOS, the laptop allows users to install their preferred operating system. It comes with a 2-year warranty, giving you peace of mind and reliable support. The Tecno MEGABOOK T1 14 is a solid all-rounder built for performance, mobility, and modern computing.

343999503.name: Acer Aspire 3 A315-59 Core i5 12th Gen 15.6" FHD Laptop

details.description_text: Model: Aspire 3 A315-59 Processor: Intel Core i5-1235U (12M Cache, 3.30 GHz, up to 4.40 GHz) RAM: 8GB DDR4, Storage: 512GB SSD Display: 15.6" FHD (1920x1080) TFT LCD Features: Stereo Speaker, Type-C Acer Aspire 3 A315-59 Core i5 12th Gen 15.6" FHD LaptopAcer Aspire 3 A315-59 Laptop comes with Intel Core i5-1235U (12M Cache, 3.30 GHz, up to 4.40 GHz). It comes with 8GB (4GBx2) DDR4 RAM, 512GB PCIe Gen4 SSD, and AMD Radeon dual-core Graphics. The Acer Aspire 3 A315-59 Laptop is also featured with a 15.6" FHD (1920x1080) high-brightness Acer ComfyView LED-backlit TFT LCD Display. The laptop is equipped with an HD webcam and stereo speaker. It runs on Windows 11 Home operating system. For connectivity options, it comes with an RJ45 port, IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac, and Bluetooth 5.0. It has been designed with 1x HDMI, 2x USB 3.2 port, and 1x USB Type-C port with DC-in. The Acer Aspire 3 A315-59 Multi-gesture touchpad, supports two-finger scroll; pinch; gestures to open Cortana, Action Center, multitasking; application commands. It has a 99-/100-/103-key Acer keyboard layout with international language support including indicators of CapsLock and F4/Microphone mute. The laptop is powered by a 40 Wh 3 cell Lithium Ion battery and comes with a 3-pin 45 W AC adapter.

536006409.name: ASUS Vivobook 15 F1504ZA-NJ1615 12th Gen Core i3 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop

details.description_text: Processor: 12th Gen Core i3-1215U RAM & Storage: 8GB DDR4, 512GBM.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 SSD Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics Display: 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) Certifications: US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard ASUS Vivobook 15 F1504ZA-NJ1615 12th Gen Core i3 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop is powered by an Intel Core i3-1215U processor, offering efficient performance for everyday tasks. This processor can easily handle common tasks such as web browsing, document editing, and multimedia playback. It has 8GB DDR4 (OnBoard). The laptop has a 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 SSD, offering ample storage space for your files and documents. The Intel UHD Graphics Card ensures decent graphics performance for basic applications and multimedia. With a 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) 16:9 aspect ratio display, the laptop delivers vibrant visuals, a fuller viewing angle, and a wider color range. This display features 250nits brightness.For a long time back up it has 42WHrs, 3S1P, 3-cell Li-ion battery. You can enjoy your outdoor work or movie time without worrying about plugging the laptop into power. For better wireless connectivity it has the latest Wi-Fi 6E(802.11ax) (Dual band) 1*1 + Bluetooth® 5.3 Wireless Card (*Bluetooth version may change with OS version different.). This laptop has a SonicMaster, Built-in speaker, and Built-in array microphone that provides a stunning audio experience. It has a variety of ports, including 1x USB 2.0 Type-A (data speed up to 480Mbps), 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C (data speed up to 5Gbps), 2x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A (data speed up to 5Gbps), 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack, 1x DC-in.The 720p HD camera with privacy shutter is ideal for video conferences, and online classes. ASUS Vivobook 15 F1504ZA-NJ1615 has many special features such as a chiclet keyboard, and a Trusted Platform Module (TPM) that provides security against threats like firmware and ransomware attacks. This laptop comes with US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard certifications. Weighing at only 1.70 kg (3.75 lbs), this is a lightweight laptop. This makes it very portable and easy to carry around. The Quiet Blue of this laptop offers a sleek and stylish look. Box content includes a Laptop. For peace of mind, Asus provides a 2-year brand warranty on laptops and a 1-year warranty on power adapters.

details.description_text: Processor: Intel Celeron N4500 Processor RAM: 8GB DDR4 Memory Storage: 256GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 3.0 SSD Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Display: 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) ASUS Vivobook Go 15 L510KA-EJ923 Intel Celeron N4500 8GB RAM 256GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop is powered by Intel Celeron N4500 processor, offering efficient performance for everyday tasks. This processor can easily handle common tasks such as web browsing, document editing, and multimedia playback. It comes with 8GB DDR4 on board. The laptop has a 256GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 3.0 SSD, offering ample storage space for your files and documents. The Intel HD Graphics Card ensures decent graphics performance for basic applications and multimedia. With a 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) 16:9 aspect ratio display, the laptop delivers vibrant visuals, a fuller viewing angle, and a wider color range. This display features 200nits brightness.For a long time back up it has 42WHrs, 3S1P, 3-cell Li-ion battery. You can enjoy your outdoor work or movie time without worrying about plugging the laptop into power. It has the latest Wi-Fi 5(802.11ac) (Dual band) 2*2 + Bluetooth 5.1 Wireless Card for better wireless connectivity. This laptop has a SonicMaster, Built-in speaker, and Built-in array microphone that provides a stunning audio experience. It has a variety of ports, including 1x USB 2.0 Type-A (data speed up to 480Mbps), 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A (data speed up to 5Gbps), 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C (data speed up to 5Gbps), 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack, 1x DC-in.The 720p HD camera is ideal for video conferences, and online classes. ASUS Vivobook Go 15 L510KA-EJ923 is packed with many special features such as a chiclet keyboard that helps in low-light areas, and a Trusted Platform Module (Firmware TPM) that provides security against threats like firmware and ransomware attacks. Weighing at only 1.57 kg (3.46 lbs), this is a lightweight laptop. This makes it very portable and easy to carry around. The Peacock Blue of this laptop offers a sleek and stylish look. Box content includes an adapter and a Laptop. For peace of mind, Asus provides a 2-year brand warranty on laptops and a 1-year warranty on power adapters.

537123497.name: Lenovo V14 G4 ABP 82YXA00QLK Ryzen 7 7730U 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 14" FHD Laptop

details.description_text: Certifications: MIL-STD-810H military test passed Processor: AMD Ryzen R7 7730U RAM & Storage: 16GB DDR4 RAM, 512GB M.2 G4 TLC SSD Graphics: Integrated AMD Radeon Graphics Display: 14.0-inch Full HD (1920x1080) The Lenovo V14 G4 ABP 82YXA00QLK is a sleek and powerful business laptop designed for professionals seeking performance and portability. Powered by the advanced AMD Ryzen 7 7730U processor with 8 cores and a max boost up to 4.5 GHz, it handles multitasking and demanding applications with ease. The 14-inch Full HD anti-glare display delivers crisp visuals while reducing eye strain, making it ideal for long working hours. With 8GB DDR4 RAM and a fast 512GB M.2 NVMe SSD, you get seamless performance and ample storage for all your documents and media. The integrated AMD Radeon Graphics ensures smooth visuals for productivity and entertainment. Multiple connectivity options including USB 3.2, USB-C, HDMI, and an SD card reader provide flexibility for external devices. 537119500.name: Asus Vivobook 15 F1504ZA‑NJ790 – 12th Gen Intel Core i3‑1215U, 8 GB DDR4 RAM, 512 GB SSD, Intel UHD Graphics, 15.6″ FHD IPS Display

details.description_text: 12th Gen Intel Core i3‑1215U processor (6 cores, 8 threads, up to 4.4 GHz) 8 GB DDR4 RAM (onboard, expandable up to 16 GB) Fast 512 GB PCIe NVMe SSD storage for quick boot and app loading 15.6″ Full HD (1920×1080) IPS antiglare display with 250 nits brightness Integrated Intel UHD Graphics for daily visuals and light work Modern ports: USB‑C, USB‑A, HDMI, combo audio jack Slim, lightweight design — around 1.70 kg Built-in 720p HD webcam with privacy shutter, SonicMaster audio Supports Wi‑Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3 Durable build tested to MIL‑STD‑810H standards The Asus Vivobook 15 F1504ZA‑NJ790 is designed for everyday productivity and entertainment. It features a 12th Gen Intel Core i3‑1215U processor with 6 cores and 8 threads, delivering reliable performance for browsing, streaming, and office tasks. With 8 GB DDR4 RAM (expandable up to 16 GB) and a fast 512 GB PCIe NVMe SSD, it ensures quick startups and smooth multitasking.The laptop’s 15.6″ Full HD IPS display offers crisp visuals with antiglare technology, making it comfortable to use under various lighting conditions. Integrated Intel UHD Graphics handle standard graphic needs, while the device remains portable thanks to its slim design and weight of about 1.70 kg.Connectivity options include USB‑C, USB‑A, HDMI, and a headphone jack. Additional features like a privacy-shutter webcam, SonicMaster speakers, and durable MIL‑STD‑810H build make it a practical choice for students and professionals alike. With support for Wi‑Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3, it keeps you connected reliably wherever you go.

537150031.name: ASUS Vivobook Go 15 L1504FA-NJ1472 Ryzen 5 7520U 16GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop

details.description_text: Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 7520U (2.8 GHz up to 4.3 GHz, 4 Cores, 8 Threads) RAM: 8GB LPDDR5 Storage: 512GB PCIe 3.0 SSD Display: 15.6" Full HD (1920 x 1080) Anti-glare Graphics: Integrated AMD Radeon Graphics Operating System: Windows 11 Home Battery: 3-cell Li-ion, 42WHrs Ports: 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C, 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, 2x USB 2.0 Type-A, 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack, 1x DC-in Weight: 1.63 kg Color: Mixed Black The ASUS Vivobook Go 15 L1504FA-NJ1472 is an ideal laptop for productivity and entertainment on the go. It features the powerful AMD Ryzen 5 7520U processor, capable of handling demanding multitasking with ease, together with 8GB of fast LPDDR5 RAM for smooth performance. Storage is both fast and ample, thanks to a 512GB PCIe 3.0 SSD which ensures quick system boot and sufficient space for your files and applications. The laptop sports a 15.6-inch Full HD anti-glare display that delivers crisp visuals and comfortable viewing even in bright conditions. Integrated AMD Radeon Graphics provide dependable visual performance for daily computing needs. With a lightweight design at just 1.63 kg and a stylish Mixed Black finish, this device is perfect for carrying to work or school. For all you do. Dell Inspiron 15-3576(15) laptop with essentials you need and more, including the latest Intel Processors, CinemaStream and CinemaSound. Features you can count on to power your day. Dynamite processing power:Intel Core i3 Processors deliver longer battery life, incredible responsiveness and smooth, seamless multitasking. Speed for everything:With support for to 4GB of memory, you can run multiple applications simultaneously and still enjoy responsive performance on your system. Graphically superior:Graphics options let you edit quickly and give your performance an extra boost. Solid performer:Get quicker load times, better shock resistance and longer battery life from an optional solid-state drive. Designed for the real world We want you to love your new PC for years to come. That's why we test Inspiron laptops for reliability not just in the places where you expect it, but for the open road ahead. Turn up the heat:From locker rooms to locked cars, we test Inspiron laptops for survival in harsh short-term heat conditions of up to 65°C/149°F. Everything hinges on it:We test Inspiron laptop hinges to ensure they still feel tight, even after opening and closing the lid 20,000 times. Keys to success:We test commonly used keys for 10 million keystrokes and touch pad buttons 1 million times with no failure. So go ahead, finish your novel. Buttoned up:No matter what you set your power and multimedia buttons to do, we've tested them all to survive up to 40,000 pushes with no problems. Twist and turn:Call us excessive, but after twisting an Inspiron laptop's base and lid more than 25,000 times, we can assure you the parts inside are well protected. details.description_text: Here are the highlights of the Chuwi HeroBook Plus:Large Display: 15.6-inch Full HD (1920×1080) IPS screen with vibrant colors and wide viewing angles. Powerful Performance: Intel Celeron N4020 processor (2 cores, up to 2.8 GHz) with 8GB LPDDR4 RAM for smooth multitasking. Fast Storage: 256GB M.2 SSD for quick boot times and plenty of storage for files and apps. Portable Design: Lightweight (1.6 kg) and slim (12mm), making it easy to carry around. Long Battery Life: 38Wh battery providing up to 8 hours of usage on a single charge. Windows 11: Pre-installed for a modern, user-friendly experience. Ample Connectivity: Dual-band Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.2, and multiple ports (USB 3.0, Type-C, HDMI, and more) for flexible device connections. Affordable Price: Great value for everyday computing needs. Chuwi HeroBook Plus – 15.6" FHD LaptopThe Chuwi HeroBook Plus is a lightweight and budget-friendly laptop designed to meet the needs of students, professionals, and everyday users. It combines a large display, efficient performance, and essential connectivity features in a sleek, portable form factor.Key SpecificationsDisplay: 15.6-inch Full HD (1920×1080) IPS screen with a 16:9 aspect ratio and 230 nits brightness, offering vibrant visuals and wide viewing angles.Processor: Intel Celeron N4020 (2 cores, 2 threads) with a base frequency of 1.1 GHz and a turbo boost up to 2.8 GHz, providing efficient performance for everyday tasks.Graphics: Integrated Intel UHD Graphics 600, suitable for light multimedia consumption and casual gaming.Memory: 8GB LPDDR4 RAM, facilitating smooth multitasking and responsiveness.Storage: 256GB M.2 SSD, offering fast boot times and ample space for documents, applications, and media files.Battery: 38Wh Li-ion battery with up to 8 hours of usage and rapid charging capabilities.Operating System: Windows 11, providing a modern and user-friendly interface.Design & BuildWeighing approximately 1.6 kg and measuring just 12mm in thickness, the HeroBook Plus is designed for portability without compromising on durability. Its polycarbonate body ensures resistance to heat and impact, making it an ideal companion for students and professionals on the go.Connectivity & PortsWi-Fi: Dual-band 2.4GHz/5GHz Wi-Fi 802.11a/ac/b/g/n for fast and stable internet connections.Bluetooth: Bluetooth 4.2 for connecting peripherals and accessories.Ports:2 x USB 3.0 ports1 x USB 2.0 port1 x USB Type-C port1 x HDMI 1.4 port1 x 3.5mm audio jack1 x RJ45 LAN port1 x TF card readerThese ports ensure compatibility with a wide range of devices and peripherals.Additional FeaturesKeyboard: Full-sized chiclet keyboard with a large 6.57" touchpad for comfortable typing and navigation.Webcam: 2MP front-facing camera with a physical privacy shutter for secure video conferencing.Audio: Integrated speakers and dual microphones for clear audio during calls and media playback.

It combines a large display, efficient performance, and essential connectivity features in a sleek, portable form factor.Key SpecificationsDisplay: 15.6-inch Full HD (1920×1080) IPS screen with a 16:9 aspect ratio and 230 nits brightness, offering vibrant visuals and wide viewing angles.Processor: Intel Celeron N4020 (2 cores, 2 threads) with a base frequency of 1.1 GHz and a turbo boost up to 2.8 GHz, providing efficient performance for everyday tasks.Graphics: Integrated Intel UHD Graphics 600, suitable for light multimedia consumption and casual gaming.Memory: 8GB LPDDR4 RAM, facilitating smooth multitasking and responsiveness.Storage: 256GB M.2 SSD, offering fast boot times and ample space for documents, applications, and media files.Battery: 38Wh Li-ion battery with up to 8 hours of usage and rapid charging capabilities.Operating System: Windows 11, providing a modern and user-friendly interface.Design & BuildWeighing approximately 1.6 kg and measuring just 12mm in thickness, the HeroBook Plus is designed for portability without compromising on durability. 536934786.name: ASUS Vivobook Go 15 OLED E1504FA-L1245W Ryzen 3 7320U 8GB RAM 512 SSD 15.6" OLED Laptop

details.description_text: Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 7320U RAM & Storage: 8GB LPDDR5 Memory, 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 3.0 SSD Graphics: AMD Radeon Graphics Display: 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) Certification: US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard ASUS Vivobook Go 15 OLED E1504FA-L1245W Ryzen 3 7320U 8GB RAM 512 SSD 15.6" OLED Laptop is powered by a Ryzen 3 7320U processor, offering efficient performance for everyday tasks. This processor can easily handle common tasks such as web browsing, document editing, and multimedia playback. It comes with 8GB LPDDR5 on board. The laptop has a 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 3.0 SSD, offering ample storage space for your files and documents. The AMD Radeon Graphics Card ensures decent graphics performance for basic applications and multimedia. With a 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) 16:9 aspect ratio display, the laptop delivers vibrant visuals, a fuller viewing angle, and a wider color range. This display features 400nits brightness and 600nits HDR peak brightness.For a long time back up it has 50WHrs, 3S1P, 3-cell Li-ion battery. You can enjoy your outdoor work or movie time without worrying about plugging the laptop into power. For better wireless connectivity it has the latest Wi-Fi 6E(802.11ax) (Dual band) 1*1 + Bluetooth 5.3 Wireless Card (*Bluetooth version may change with OS version different). This laptop has a SonicMaster, Built-in speaker, and Built-in array microphone that provides a stunning audio experience. It has a variety of ports, including 1x USB 2.0 Type-A (data speed up to 480Mbps), 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A (data speed up to 5Gbps), 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C (data speed up to 5Gbps), 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack, 1x DC-inThe 720p HD camera with privacy shutter is ideal for video conferences, and online classes. ASUS Vivobook Go 15 OLED E1504FA-L1245W is packed with many special features such as a backlit chiclet keyboard that helps in low-light areas, and a Trusted Platform Module (Firmware TPM) that provides security against threats like firmware and ransomware attacks. This laptop comes with US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard certifications. Weighing at only 1.63 kg (3.59 lbs), this is a lightweight laptop. This makes it very portable and easy to carry around. The genuine Windows 11 Home is preloaded on this laptop. The Mixed Black of this laptop offers a sleek and stylish look. Box content includes a Laptop. For peace of mind, Asus provides a 2-year brand warranty on laptops and a 1-year warranty on power adapters.

536008658.name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i (82RK00ULIN) 12TH Gen Core i3 8GB RAM 512GB SSD Laptop

details.description_text: CPU: Intel Core i3-1215U RAM: 8GB Soldered DDR4-3200 Storage: 512GB SSD M.2 2242 PCIe 4.0x4 NVMe IGPU: Integrated Intel UHD Graphics Display: 15.6" FHD (1920x1080) 250nits Anti-glare The Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i (82RK00ULIN) is a sleek and efficient 15.6‑inch laptop, ideal for students, professionals, and anyone seeking dependable daily performance. It is powered by a 12th Gen Intel Core i3‑1215U (2 performance cores + 4 efficiency cores, up to 4.40 GHz), delivering solid responsiveness for tasks like browsing, streaming, document editing, and light multitasking.With 8 GB DDR4‑3200 RAM soldered onboard and room for expansion up to 16 GB via an open SO‑DIMM slot, you have enough memory to handle multiple apps smoothly. A speedy 512 GB M.2 NVMe SSD ensures fast startup, quick file access, and ample storage for your photos, videos, and software .The 15.6‑inch FHD (1920×1080) anti‑glare display offers crisp visuals with decent brightness (~250 nits), making it suitable for both indoor environments and well‑lit rooms.Graphics are handled by integrated Intel UHD, enough for everyday media and light photo editing.Its thin profile (≈19.9 mm) and light weight (~1.63 kg) make it easy to carry around.The laptop features a practical port selection USB‑C (data, power, DisplayPort), USB‑A, HDMI—for flexible connectivity . You’ll also find an HD webcam with a privacy shutter, stereo speakers with Dolby Audio, Wi‑Fi 6, Bluetooth 5.2, and a 45 Wh battery offering all‑day productivity.Overall, the IdeaPad Slim 3i delivers a well-rounded blend of performance, storage, portability, and features an excellent value for users needing a reliable and stylish laptop for everyday use.

details.description_text: Processor Brand - Intel Processor Model - N100 Generation - 12th GEN Processor Frequency - Up to 3.40 GHz Processor Core - 4 Processor Thread - 4 CPU Cache - 6 MB Intel Smart Cache Display Size - 14 Inch Display Resolution - FHD (1920 x 1080) Touch Screen - No RAM - 8GB RAM Type - DDR4 Bus Speed - 3200 MHz Max RAM Capacity - up to 16GB Storage Type - NVMe SSD Storage Capacity - 256GB Supported SSD Type - NVMe SSD Storage Upgrade - up to 1TB Graphics Model - Intel UHD Graphics Graphics Memory - Shared Graphics Type - Integrated Keyboard Type - Standard Keyboard WebCam - 2MP Speaker - Yes Microphone - 2×D-MIC in Camera Module HDMI Port - 1x HDMI 1.4 USB 2 Port - 1× USB 2.0 USB 3 Port - 2×USB 3.2 Gen1 USB Type-C / Thunderbolt Port - 2×USB Type-C Headphone & Microphone Port - 1× Ø3.5mmCombo LAN - 1× RJ45 WiFi - Yes Bluetooth - Yes Operating System - FreeDOS Battery Capacity - 7.6V 6000mah, 45.6Wh Adapter Type - Type-C PD Adaptor Dimensions - 321.7×206.6× 19.5mm Weight - 1.5kg Warranty - 2 Year Warranty Dahua DHI-NC14-EIN2L1 Intel N100 12th Gen 14" FHD LaptopThe Dahua DHI-NC14-EIN2L1 is a sleek and efficient 14-inch Full HD laptop powered by the Intel N100 12th Generation processor, making it an excellent choice for students, professionals, and everyday users looking for a balance of performance and portability. With a 1920x1080 screen resolution and a 16:9 aspect ratio, it provides clear pictures on an LED-backlit IPS panel with a 178-degree horizontal and vertical viewing angle. The hinge opens fully 180 degrees, allowing for comfortable viewing and communication. This Dahua DHI-NC14-EIN2L1 Intel N100 12th Gen 14" FHD Laptop lacks a touchscreen but concentrates on providing sharp display quality and efficient performance. The CPU works at up to 3.40GHz with four cores and four threads, allowing it to do daily chores smoothly while consuming only 6W in regular mode and less than 1.5W in standby. The Dahua DHI-NC14-EIN2L1 Laptop has 8GB DDR4 RAM @ 3200MHz, which can be expanded up to 16GB, and a 256GB NVMe SSD that can be extended to 1TB for more storage. The Dahua DHI-NC14-EIN2L1 Intel N100 12th Gen 14" FHD Laptop has a variety of I/O connections, including HDMI 1.4, two USB 3.2 Gen1, two USB Type-C, one USB 2.0, an RJ45 LAN connector, and a 3.5mm audio combination jack, ensuring good communication. The camera module has an optional 2MP front camera and two microphones for video conferences and online meetings. Wireless communication is also available, with WiFi and Bluetooth options. The Dahua DHI-NC14-EIN2L1 laptop includes a 7.6V 6000mAh battery rated at 45.6Wh, which provides adequate usage time on a single charge. An orange LED indicates that the device is charging, while a blue LED indicates that it is fully charged. It comes with a Type-C PD adapter for quick and easy charging. The Dahua DHI-NC14-EIN2L1 laptop is suitable for everyday usage and is compatible with both Windows 10 and Windows 11.

535985755.name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i (83ER00DGLK) 12th Gen Core i5 16GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop

details.description_text: 12th Gen Intel Core i5-1235U Processor (up to 4.40 GHz, 10 Cores) 8GB DDR4 RAM, 512GB PCIe NVMe SSD 15.6" Full HD (1920x1080) Anti-glare Display Intel Iris Xe Graphics Slim and lightweight design (1.62 kg) Pre-installed Windows 11 Home Multiple connectivity options: USB 3.2, USB 2.0, HDMI, SD Card Reader, Audio Combo Jack Rapid charging and long battery life Elegant Arctic Grey color Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i (83ER00DGLK) 12th Gen Core i5 16GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD LaptopLenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i (83ER00DGLK) 12th Gen Core i5 16GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop is powered by the latest 12th Gen Intel Core i5-12450H processor, offering efficient performance for everyday tasks. This processor can easily handle common tasks such as web browsing, document editing, and multimedia playback. It comes with 16GB Soldered LPDDR5-4800 memory. The laptop has 512GB M.2 2242 PCIe 4.0x4 NVMe SSD, offering ample storage space for your files and documents. The Integrated Intel UHD Graphics ensures decent graphics performance for basic applications and multimedia. With a 15.6" Full HD (1920x1080) 250nits Anti-glare display, the laptop delivers vibrant visuals, a fuller viewing angle, and a wider color range.For a long time back up it has Integrated 47Wh battery. You can enjoy your outdoor work or movie time without worrying about plugging the laptop into power. For better wireless connectivity it has the latest Wi-Fi 6, 802.11ax 2x2, and Bluetooth 5.2 Wireless Card. This laptop comes with user-facing stereo speakers, 1.5W x2, and is optimized with a Dolby audio system that provides a stunning audio experience. It has a variety of ports, including 2x USB 3.2 Gen 1, 1x USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 (support data transfer, Power Delivery, and DisplayPort 1.2), 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x Headphone/microphone combo jack (3.5mm), 1x Card reader, 1x Power connector.The HD 720p with Privacy Shutter webcam is ideal for video conferences, and online classes. Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i (8) (83ER00DGLK) has special features such as a Firmware TPM 2.0 Enabled that provides security against threats like firmware and ransomware attacks. Weighing at only 1.62 kg (3.57 lbs), this is a lightweight laptop. The Arctic Grey of this laptop offers a sleek and stylish look. Box content includes Laptop, 65W Round Tip (3-pin) power adapter, and user manuals. For peace of mind, Lenovo provides a 2-year brand warranty on laptops and a 1-year warranty on power adapters.

details.description_text: Processor Brand - AMD Processor Model - Ryzen 5 7430U Generation - Ryzen 7000 Series Processor Frequency - up to 4.3GHz Processor Core - 6 cores Processor Thread - 12T CPU Cache - 16MB Display Size - 15.6-inch Display Type - TFT Display Resolution - FHD (1920x1080) Touch Screen - No Refresh Rate - 60Hz Display Features - LED Backlit, Aspect ratio: 16:9, Glare: Anti-glare, Screen-to-body ratio: 91% Brightness - 300nits Peak Brightness, 45% NTSC color gamut RAM - 16GB RAM Type - DDR4 Removable - No Bus Speed - 3200 MHz Max RAM Capacity - 32GB Storage Type - M.2 2280 NVME PCI-e 3 Storage Capacity - 512GB Graphics Model - AMD Radeon Graphics Graphics Memory - Shared Keyboard Type - Chiclet Keyboard With Independent numeric key, with UV coating TouchPad - Precision touchpad with the dualpoint butto WebCam - 1 MP Speaker - Build-in two speakers (4Ω/2W) Microphone - Built-in array microphone Audio Features - Realtek ALC269QN-VC3-GR(VB6/VC3), Support DTS Card Reader - TF card x1 HDMI Port - HDMI 1.4 x1 USB 2 Port - USB 3.2 Gen2 x1 (speed 10Gbps), USB 3.2 Gen1 x1 ( speed 5Gbps) USB Type-C / Thunderbolt Port - Type-C x1 (Charge &data & display) Headphone & Microphone Port - 3.5 Jack CTIA *1 LAN - RJ45x1, Support 1000Mbps WiFi - 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac Bluetooth - Bluetooth 5.1 Fingerprint Sensor - Yes Security Locker Slot - Kensington Lock Camera Privacy Shutter - Yes Operating System - Free Dos Battery Type - 3-cell Li-Poly Battery Capacity - 70WHrs Adapter Type - 65W 20V/3.25A AC adapator with Type-C Charge, cable 1.8m Color - Silver Dimensions - 359.5×251.5×17.7mm Weight - Weight (with Battery): Around 1.67kg, Weight (without Battery): Around 1.4kg Warranty Details - 02 years Warranty (Battery & Adapter 1 Year) Tecno MEGABOOK K15SDA AMD Ryzen 5 7430U 15.6″ FHD LaptopThe Tecno MEGABOOK K15SDA Laptop is a sleek and high-performance device designed for professionals, students, and everyday users who need both power and portability. Powered by the AMD Ryzen 5 7430U processor from the Ryzen 7000 Series, this Tecno MEGABOOK K15SDA Ryzen 5 Laptop features 6 cores, 12 threads, 16MB L3 cache, and speeds of up to 4.3GHz for smooth multitasking and efficient performance. It comes with 16GB DDR4 3200MHz RAM (non-removable, expandable up to 32GB) and a fast 512GB M.2 PCIe 3.0 NVMe SSD, ensuring quick data access and ample storage for work and entertainment. The Tecno MEGABOOK K15SDA Ryzen 5 15.6″ Laptop sports a 15.6-inch TFT Full HD (1920×1080) LED-backlit display with 300nits brightness, anti-glare coating, 45% NTSC color gamut, and an impressive 91% screen-to-body ratio for immersive viewing. Graphics are handled by integrated AMD Radeon Graphics, ideal for smooth visuals and light creative tasks. The laptop also includes a chiclet keyboard with UV coating, a precision touchpad with dual-point buttons, and enhanced security features like a fingerprint sensor, Kensington lock slot, and privacy shutter for its 1MP webcam. Audio is delivered through dual 4Ω/2W speakers with DTS support and a built-in array microphone. Connectivity options are abundant, including RJ45 Gigabit LAN, Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, Bluetooth 5.1, USB 3.2 Gen2 (10Gbps), USB 3.2 Gen1 (5Gbps), USB Type-C (charging, data, and display), HDMI 1.4, TF card slot, and a 3.5mm audio jack. Running on FreeDOS, the Tecno MEGABOOK K15SDA is powered by a 3-cell 70WHrs Li-Poly battery with a 65W Type-C charger for fast, efficient charging. Its slim 17.7mm profile, elegant silver finish, and lightweight 1.67kg build make it the perfect choice for those who value both style and performance.

535998997.name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i (83EL0044LK) 13th Gen Core i5 16GB RAM 512GB SSD 14-inch FHD Laptop

details.description_text: Certification: MIL-STD-810H military test passed Processor: 13th Gen Intel Core i5-13420H RAM: 16GB LPDDR5-4800 Memory Storage: 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0x4 SSD Display: 14-inch Full HD (1920x1080) Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i (83EL0044LK) 13th Gen Core i5 16GB RAM 512GB SSD 14-inch FHD Laptop is powered by the latest 13th Gen Intel Core i5-13420H processor, offering efficient performance for everyday tasks. This processor can easily handle common tasks such as web browsing, document editing, and multimedia playback. It comes with 16GB Soldered LPDDR5-4800 memory. The laptop has 512GB M.2 2242 PCIe 4.0x4 NVMe SSD, offering ample storage space for your files and documents. The Integrated Intel UHD Graphics ensures decent graphics performance for basic applications and multimedia. With a 14.0" Full HD (1920x1080) 250nits Anti-glare display, the laptop delivers vibrant visuals, a fuller viewing angle, and a wider color range.For a long time back up it has Integrated 47Wh battery. You can enjoy your outdoor work or movie time without worrying about plugging the laptop into power. For better wireless connectivity it has the latest Wi-Fi 6, 802.11ax 2x2, and Bluetooth 5.2 Wireless Card. This laptop comes with user-facing stereo speakers, 1.5W x2, and is optimized with a Dolby audio system that provides a stunning audio experience. It has a variety of ports, including 2x USB 3.2 Gen 1, 1x USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 (support data transfer, Power Delivery, and DisplayPort 1.2), 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x Headphone/microphone combo jack (3.5mm), 1x Card reader, 1x Power connector.The FHD 1080p with Privacy Shutter webcam is ideal for video conferences, and online classes. Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i (8) (83EL0044LK) has special features such as a Firmware TPM 2.0 Enabled that provides security against threats like firmware and ransomware attacks. Weighing at only 1.37 kg (3.02 lbs), this is a lightweight laptop. The Arctic Grey of this laptop offers a sleek and stylish look. Box content includes Laptop, 65W Round Tip (3-pin) power adapter, and user manuals. For peace of mind, Lenovo provides a 2-year brand warranty on laptops and a 1-year warranty on power adapters.

536008511.name: ASUS Vivobook 16X K3605ZF-RP785N 12th Gen Core i5-12500H 16GB RAM 512GB SSD RTX 2050 16.0-inch WUXGA Laptop

details.description_text: Processor: Intel Core i5-12500H RAM & Storage: 16GB DDR4 Memory, 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 SSD Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2050 4GB GDDR6 Laptop GPU Display: 16.0-inch WUXGA (1920 x 1200) Certification: US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard ASUS Vivobook 16X K3605ZF-RP785N 12th Gen Core i5-12500H 16GB RAM 512GB SSD RTX 2050 16.0-inch WUXGA Laptop comes with a stunning 16.0-inch WUXGA display with a (1920 x 1200) 16:10 aspect ratio, 300nits HDR peak brightness, and a 144Hz refresh rate: this display features an Anti-glare display, a 45% NTSC color gamut, TÜV Rheinland-certified. The IPS display provides a fuller viewing angle, a wider color range, and much faster refresh rates. This remarkable display makes it perfect for content creators, graphic designers, and anyone who values stunning visuals in their work or entertainment. The latest Intel Core i5-12500H Processor has 4 P-Cores + 8 E-Cores and 16 threads that deliver up to 4.5 GHz frequency with an 18MB cache. This high-frequency processor helps to process power-hungry applications with ease. So, for people who use photo editing and video editing software and require powerful chipsets, this laptop can be the best option for them. This Asus laptop comes with the latest DDR4 16GB onboard memory. It has a respectable 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 SSD. The NVMe SSD delivers the highest throughput and fastest response times for all types of enterprise workloads. This particular model of ASUS Vivobook 16X K3605ZF-RP785N is equipped with an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2050 4GB GDDR6 GPU. For gaming and content creation, this GPU is more than enough.For long-term backup, it has a 50WHrs, 3S1P, 3-cell Li-ion battery. You can enjoy your outdoor work or movie time without worrying about plugging the laptop into power. For better wireless connectivity, it has the latest Wi-Fi 6E(802.11ax) (Dual band) 1*1 + Bluetooth 5.3 Wireless Card (*Bluetooth version may change with OS version differences.) provides faster wireless speeds and lower latency. This laptop comes with a SonicMaster Audio system that provides a stunning audio experience. It has a variety of ports, including 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C with support for power delivery (data speed up to 5Gbps), 2x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A (data speed up to 5Gbps), 1x HDMI 2.1 TMDS, 1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack, 1x DC-in SD 4.0 card reader.The 720p HD camera, with a privacy shutter, is ideal for video conferences and online classes. ASUS Vivobook 16X K3605ZF-RP785N is packed with special features such as a Backlit Chiclet Keyboard with Num-key for low-light areas, Fingerprint, and a Trusted Platform Module (TPM) that provides security against threats like firmware and ransomware attacks. Weighing in at only 1.80 kg, this is a lightweight laptop. This makes it very portable and easy to carry around. Windows 11 Home is preloaded on this laptop. This Cool Silver colored laptop is visually eye-pleasing. Box content includes a Laptop, ø4.5, a 120W AC Adapter, a Backpack, and user manuals. For peace of mind, Asus provides a 2-year brand warranty on laptops and a 1-year warranty on power adapters.

535991831.name: ASUS Vivobook 15 F1504ZA-NJ699 12th Gen Core i5 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6" FHD Laptop

details.description_text: Processor: 12th Gen Intel Core i5-1235U RAM & Storage: 8GB DDR4 RAM, 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 SSD Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics Display: 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) Certifications: US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard ASUS Vivobook 15 F1504ZA-NJ699 12th Gen Core i5 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6" FHD Laptop is powered by an Intel Core i5-1235U processor, offering efficient performance for everyday tasks. This processor can easily handle common tasks such as web browsing, document editing, and multimedia playback. It comes with 8GB DDR4 on board. The laptop has a 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 SSD, offering ample storage space for your files and documents. The Intel UHD Graphics Card ensures decent graphics performance for basic applications and multimedia. With a 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) 16:9 aspect ratio display, the laptop delivers vibrant visuals, a fuller viewing angle, and a wider color range. This display features 250nits brightness.For a long time back up it has 42WHrs, 3S1P, 3-cell Li-ion battery. You can enjoy your outdoor work or movie time without worrying about plugging the laptop into power. For better wireless connectivity it has the latest Wi-Fi 6E(802.11ax) (Dual band) 1*1 + Bluetooth 5.3 Wireless Card (*Bluetooth version may change with OS version different.). This laptop has a SonicMaster, Built-in speaker, and Built-in array microphone that provides a stunning audio experience. It has a variety of ports, including 1x USB 2.0 Type-A (data speed up to 480Mbps), 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C (data speed up to 5Gbps), 2x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A (data speed up to 5Gbps), 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack, 1x DC-in.The 720p HD camera with privacy shutter is ideal for video conferences, and online classes. ASUS Vivobook 15 F1504ZA-NJ699 is packed with many special features such as a chiclet keyboard, and a Trusted Platform Module (TPM) that provides security against threats like firmware and ransomware attacks. This laptop comes with US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard certifications. Weighing at only 1.70 kg (3.75 lbs), this is a lightweight laptop. This makes it very portable and easy to carry around. The Quiet Blue of this laptop offers a sleek and stylish look. Box content includes a Laptop. For peace of mind, Asus provides a 2-year brand warranty on laptops and a 1-year warranty on power adapters.

details.description_text: Model: 15s-eq3619AU Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5625U (16MB L3 Cache, 2.3GHz, up to 4.3GHz) RAM: 8GB DDR4, Storage: 512GB SSD Display: 15" FHD (1920 x 1080) Features: Full-size Keyboard, Type-C HP 15s-eq3619AU Ryzen 5 5625U 15.6" FHD LaptopThe HP 15s-eq3619AU is powered by AMD Ryzen 5 5625U (16MB L3 Cache, 2.3GHz, up to 4.3GHz) with AMD Radeon Graphics. This new HP 15s laptop comes with 8GB DDR4 RAM and 15.6" diagonal, FHD (1920 x 1080), IPS, micro-edge, anti-glare, 250 nits, 45% NTSC Display Display. This laptop is designed to run more efficiently and reliably at faster speeds with DDR4 RAM, everything from multi-tasking to playing games gets a performance boost. Hp 15s Laptop is available in capacities up to 512GB NVMe PCIe SSD storage. This laptop runs on Windows 11 Home 64 operating system. The whole system of this HP 15s-eq3619AU Laptop is powered by a 3-cell, 41 Wh Li-ion battery. With long battery life and fast-charge technology, work, watch, and you can stay connected all day. It comes with an HP TrueVision HD Camera with an integrated dual array digital microphone and TouchPad keyboard. This Integrated precision touchpad featured multi-touch support that speeds up navigation and productivity. This laptop has USB: 2 x Type-A, 1 x USB Type-C, HDMI: 1 x HDMI port, and connectivity. This Hp Laptop is also equipped with Wi-Fi 802.11a, b, g, n, ac (1x1), and Bluetooth wireless network connectivity. The new HP 15s-eq3619AU laptop comes with a simply gorgeous look. It is perfect for your daily office work and home use.

344099137.name: Acer Aspire Lite AL15-51 (UN.431SI.327) Laptop, Intel® Core™ i5-1155G7 2.5GHz up to 4.5GHz,8GB DDR4 Ram, 512GB NVMe SSD,Intel® Iris® Xe Graphics, 15.6" FHD Display

details.description_text: Model: Acer Aspire Lite AL15-51Processor: Intel Core i5-1155G7Memory: 8GB DDR4, 512GB SSDDisplay: 15.6" FHD (1920x1080)Features: Stereo Speakers, Built-In Microphones, Type-CAcer Aspire Lite AL15-51 Core i5 11th Gen 15.6" FHD LaptopThe Acer Aspire Lite AL15-51 is a high-performance laptop that meets both productivity and entertainment needs. It is powered by the Intel Core i5 1155G7 CPU, which features an 8M cache and a clock speed range of 2.5GHz to 4.5GHz, guaranteeing seamless app and activity processing. This laptop's 8GB DDR4 RAM not only provides for flawless multitasking but also increases overall system performance. The Acer Aspire Lite AL15-51 includes a 512GB SSD, which has adequate space for your documents, entertainment, and apps while also providing faster data access rates. The 15.6-inch Full HD display with 1920x1080 pixel resolution offers clear visuals and vibrant colors, making it ideal for content creation, streaming, and immersive viewing experiences. The audio quality of the built-in dual speakers is outstanding, enhancing the whole entertainment and multimedia experience. A Type-C connector adds a modern touch while also providing a variety of connectivity options for peripherals and external devices. The Acer Aspire Lite AL15-51 strikes a good balance of functionality and design. This laptop is a trusty companion that combines performance, storage, and a visually beautiful display in a sleek and tiny form factor, whether you're working on a project, watching a movie, or creating something artistic.

535995681.name: ASUS Vivobook 15 X1504ZA-NJ1762W 12th Gen Core i7 16GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop

details.description_text: Processor: 12th Gen Intel Core i7-1255U RAM & Storage: 16GB DDR4 Memory, 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 SSD Graphics: Intel Iris Xᵉ Graphics Display: 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) Certifications: US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard ASUS Vivobook 15 X1504ZA-NJ1762W 12th Gen Core i7 16GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop is powered by an Intel Core i7-1255U processor, offering efficient performance for everyday tasks. This processor can handle common tasks such as web browsing, document editing, and multimedia playback with ease. It comes with 16GB DDR4 (8GB OnBoard and 8GB SO-DIMM). The laptop has a respective 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 SSD, offering ample storage space for your files and documents. The Intel Iris Xᵉ Graphics Card ensures decent graphics performance for basic applications and multimedia. With a 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) 16:9 aspect ratio display, the laptop delivers vibrant visuals, a fuller viewing angle, and a wider color range. This display features 250nits brightness.For a long time back up it has 42WHrs, 3S1P, 3-cell Li-ion battery. You can enjoy your outdoor work or movie time without worrying about plugging the laptop into power. For better wireless connectivity it has the latest Wi-Fi 6E(802.11ax) (Dual band) 1*1 + Bluetooth 5.3 Wireless Card (*Bluetooth version may change with OS version different.). This laptop comes with a SonicMaster, Built-in speaker, and Built-in array microphone that provides a stunning audio experience. It has a variety of ports, including 1x USB 2.0 Type-A (data speed up to 480Mbps), 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C (data speed up to 5Gbps), 2x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A (data speed up to 5Gbps), 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack, 1x DC-in.The 720p HD camera with privacy shutter is ideal for video conferences, and online classes. ASUS Vivobook 15 X1504ZA-NJ1762W is packed with many special features such as a backlit chiclet keyboard, and a Trusted Platform Module (TPM) that provides security against threats like firmware and ransomware attacks. This laptop comes with US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard certifications. Weighing at only 1.70 kg (3.75 lbs), this is a lightweight laptop. This makes it very portable and easy to carry around. The Quiet Blue of this laptop offers a sleek and stylish look. Box content includes a Laptop. For peace of mind, Asus provides a 2-year brand warranty on laptops and a 1-year warranty on power adapters.

535999267.name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i (8) (82X7003QLK) 13th Gen Core-i3 Laptop

details.description_text: 13th Gen Intel Core i3-1315U Processor (up to 4.50 GHz) 8GB DDR4 RAM, 512GB SSD (M.2 NVMe) 15.6" FHD (1920x1080) Anti-glare Display Integrated Intel UHD Graphics Windows 11 Home (pre-installed) Lightweight and portable design (1.62 kg) Multiple I/O Ports: USB, HDMI, SD Card Reader, Audio Jack Battery Capacity Integrated 47Wh Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i (82X7003QLK) 13th Gen Core-i3 LaptopLenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i (82X7008CLK) 13th Gen Core-i3 Laptop is powered by the latest 13th Gen Intel Core i3-1305U processor, offering efficient performance for everyday tasks. This processor can easily handle common tasks such as web browsing, document editing, and multimedia playback. It comes with 8GB of Soldered LPDDR5-4800 memory. The laptop has 512GB M.2 2242 PCIe 4.0x4 NVMe SSD, offering ample storage space for your files and documents. The Integrated Intel UHD Graphics ensures decent graphics performance for basic applications and multimedia. With a 15.6" FHD (1920x1080) 250nits Anti-glare display, the laptop delivers vibrant visuals, a fuller viewing angle, and a wider color range.For a long time back up it has Integrated 47Wh battery. You can enjoy your outdoor work or movie time without worrying about plugging the laptop into power. For better wireless connectivity it has the latest Wi-Fi 6, 11ax 2x2, and Bluetooth 5.2 Wireless Card. This laptop comes with User-facing stereo speakers, 1.5W x2, optimized with Dolby Audio system, that provides a stunning audio experience. It has a variety of ports, including 2x USB 3.2 Gen 1, 1x USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 (support data transfer, Power Delivery, and DisplayPort 1.2), 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x Headphone/microphone combo jack (3.5mm), 1x Card reader and 1x Power connector.The FHD 1080p with Privacy Shutter webcam is ideal for video conferences, and online classes. Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i (82X7003QLK) has special features such as a Trusted Platform Module (TPM) that provides security against threats like firmware and ransomware attacks. Weighing at only 1.62 kg (3.57 lbs), this is a lightweight laptop. This makes it very portable and easy to carry around. This laptop comes with Windows 11 Home Single Language, English operating system. The Abyss Blue of this laptop offers a sleek and stylish look. Box content includes Laptop, power adapter, and user manuals. For peace of mind, Lenovo provides a 2-year brand warranty on laptops and a 1-year warranty on power adapters.

535998583.name: ASUS Vivobook Go 15 L1504FA-NJ1366 Ryzen 5 7520U 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop

details.description_text: Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 7520U RAM & Storage: 8GB LPDDR5 Memory, 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 3.0 SSD Graphics: AMD Radeon Graphics Display: 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) Certification: US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard ASUS Vivobook Go 15 L1504FA-NJ1366 Ryzen 5 7520U 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6-inch FHD Laptop is powered by a Ryzen 5 7520U processor, offering efficient performance for everyday tasks. This processor can easily handle common tasks such as web browsing, document editing, and multimedia playback. It comes with 8GB LPDDR5 on board. The laptop has a 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 3.0 SSD, offering ample storage space for your files and documents. The AMD Radeon Graphics Card ensures decent graphics performance for basic applications and multimedia. With a 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) 16:9 aspect ratio display, the laptop delivers vibrant visuals, a fuller viewing angle, and a wider color range. This display features 250nits brightness.For a long time back up it has 42WHrs, 3S1P, 3-cell Li-ion battery. You can enjoy your outdoor work or movie time without worrying about plugging the laptop into power. For better wireless connectivity it has the latest Wi-Fi 6E(802.11ax) (Dual band) 1*1 + Bluetooth 5.3 Wireless Card (*Bluetooth version may change with OS version different.). This laptop has a SonicMaster, Built-in speaker, and Built-in array microphone that provides a stunning audio experience. It has a variety of ports, including 1x USB 2.0 Type-A (data speed up to 480Mbps), 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A (data speed up to 5Gbps), 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C (data speed up to 5Gbps), 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack, 1x DC-in.The 720p HD camera with privacy shutter is ideal for video conferences, and online classes. ASUS Vivobook Go 15 L1504FA-NJ1366 is packed with many special features such as a chiclet keyboard that helps in low-light areas, and a Trusted Platform Module (Firmware TPM) that provides security against threats like firmware and ransomware attacks. This laptop comes with US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard certifications. Weighing at only 1.63 kg (3.59 lbs), this is a lightweight laptop. This makes it very portable and easy to carry around. The Cool Silver of this laptop offers a sleek and stylish look. Box content includes an adapter and a Laptop. For peace of mind, Asus provides a 2-year brand warranty on laptops and a 1-year warranty on power adapters.

Powered by the latest 13th Generation Intel Core i5-13420H processor, it handles multitasking and demanding applications with ease. The 15.6-inch Full HD anti-glare display delivers crisp visuals, making it ideal for both work and entertainment. With 8GB of DDR4 RAM and a fast 512GB PCIe NVMe SSD, users can expect smooth performance, faster boot times, and ample space for all essential files and software. The integrated Intel UHD Graphics efficiently manages graphics requirements for everyday tasks and entertainment. Its ultra-slim, lightweight build at just 1.62 kg ensures easy portability, while a comprehensive set of input/output ports — including USB 3.2, USB-C, HDMI, card reader, and audio jack — guarantees excellent connectivity. Pre-installed with Windows 11 Home, this laptop is ready for immediate use, whether at home, in the classroom, or at the office.

537141801.name: ASUS Vivobook 15 (X1502ZA-EJ1249W) 12TH Gen Core i5 8GB RAM 512GB SSD Terra Cotta Laptop

details.description_text: Processor: 12th Gen Intel Core i5-1235U (up to 4.4 GHz, 10 cores, 12 threads) RAM: 8GB DDR4 Storage: 512GB PCIe G3 NVMe M.2 SSD Display: 15.6" FHD (1920 x 1080), Anti-glare, LED-backlit Graphics: Integrated Intel Iris Xe Graphics Operating System: Windows 11 Home Battery: 3-cell Li-ion, 42WHrs Ports: 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C, 2x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, 1x USB 2.0 Type-A, 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack, 1x DC-in The ASUS Vivobook 15 X1502ZA-EJ1249W delivers exceptional performance in a stylish and portable package. Powered by the latest 12th Gen Intel Core i5-1235U processor and 8GB DDR4 RAM, this laptop is built for seamless multitasking and productivity. Its speedy 512GB PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD ensures fast access to your data and smooth overall system performance. The 15.6-inch Full HD anti-glare display offers vibrant visuals and comfortable viewing, ideal for work, study, and entertainment. Integrated Intel Iris Xe Graphics provide reliable graphics performance for creative tasks and everyday use. This Vivobook is pre-installed with Windows 11 Home, offering a secure, up-to-date computing experience. With a lightweight build at just 1.70 kg and an eye-catching Terra Cotta color, it stands out while remaining easy to carry. It features a comprehensive selection of I/O ports, including USB Type-C, multiple USB Type-A ports, HDMI, and a combo audio jack, ensuring flexible connectivity for all your devices.

536019152.name: ASUS Vivobook 15 (X1504VA-NJ260W) 13TH Gen Core i3 8GB RAM 256GB SSD Laptop

details.description_text: Processor: Intel Core i3-1315U Memory: DDR4 8GB Storage: 256GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 SSD IGPU: Intel UHD Graphics *Intel Iris Xᵉ Graphics is only available in models with Intel Core i5/i7/i9 processors and dual-channel memory. Display: 15.6-inch FHD (1920 x 1080) 16:9 aspect ratio The ASUS Vivobook 15 (X1504VA-NJ260W) is a stylish and reliable laptop designed for everyday computing needs. Powered by a 13th Gen Intel Core i3-1315U processor, it delivers smooth performance for tasks like web browsing, document editing, video streaming, and light multitasking. With 8GB of DDR4 RAM and a 256GB PCIe SSD, the laptop ensures fast boot times and responsive operation, making it suitable for both students and professionals.This Vivobook features a 15.6-inch Full HD display with anti-glare coating, offering clear visuals and a comfortable viewing experience, even during long hours of use. The sleek and lightweight design (approx. 1.7kg) makes it easy to carry around, whether you're at home, in class, or on the go.Connectivity is well-covered with USB-C, USB-A, HDMI, and a 3.5mm audio jack. It also includes Wi-Fi 5 and Bluetooth 5.1 support for wireless connections. The laptop comes with a full-size backlit keyboard and a fingerprint sensor for added convenience and security. The built-in 720p webcam includes a privacy shutter for peace of mind during video calls.Overall, the ASUS Vivobook 15 X1504VA-NJ260W offers great value for money, combining modern design, dependable performance, and useful features perfect for everyday tasks and portable productivity.

536030679.name: Lenovo ThinkPad E14 Gen 6 Core Ultra 5 125H 16GB RAM 512GB SSD 14.0-inch WUXGA Copilot+ PC

details.description_text: Intel Core Ultra 5 125H Processor (14 Cores, up to 4.5 GHz, 18MB Cache) 16GB LPDDR5x RAM, 512GB PCIe Gen4 SSD Storage 14-inch FHD+ (1920 x 1200) IPS, 300 nits Anti-glare Display Intel Arc Graphics (Integrated) Copilot+ AI features for next-level productivity Full range of ports: USB-C, USB-A, HDMI, RJ-45, Audio Combo Jack Backlit keyboard, Fingerprint reader Lightweight and durable chassis, 1.41 kg Lenovo ThinkPad E14 Gen 6 (21M7S0R800) Core Ultra 5 125H 16GB RAM 512GB SSD 14.0-inch WUXGA Copilot+ PCLenovo ThinkPad E14 Gen 6 (21M7S0R800) Core Ultra 5 125H 16GB RAM 512GB SSD 14.0-inch WUXGA Copilot+ PC is a versatile and efficient laptop designed for business users. This laptop is equipped with an Intel Core Ultra 5-125H Processor with Intel AI Boost, which provides up to 4.5GHz frequency of clock speed with an 18MB cache. This high-frequency processor ensures efficient performance for everyday tasks and multitasking. It comes with 16GB DDR5-5600MHz Bus memory. The laptop has a respective 512GB M.2 NVMe SSD with an Unoccupied SSD Slot. The NVMe SSD provides ample space for storing your files, documents, multimedia content, and software applications with a faster response time. It has Integrated Intel Arc Graphics, one of the world's most powerful notebook graphics. Lenovo ThinkPad E14 Gen 6 comes with a stunning 14.0-inch WUXGA (1920x1200) IPS display with a 300-nits brightness.A 3-cell 57Wh Internal battery is included for long-term backup powering it. For the fastest wireless connectivity, this laptop features Intel Wi-Fi 6E AX211, 802.11ax 2x2 Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 5.3, and an M.2 Card. This laptop also has a Gigabit Ethernet, 1x RJ-45 port, which supports faster LAN connections. The High Definition (HD) Audio, Senary SN6141 codec/Stereo speakers, 2W x2, Dolby Audio System ensures an enjoyable and clear audio experience. It has a variety of ports, including 1x USB-A (USB 5Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 1), 1x USB-A (USB 10Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 2), Always On, 1x USB-C (USB 20Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 2x2), with USB PD 3.0 and DisplayPort 1.4, 1x USB-C (Thunderbolt™ 4 / USB4® 40Gbps), with USB PD 3.0 and DisplayPort 2.1, 1x HDMI 2.1, up to 4K/60Hz, 1x Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm), 1x Ethernet (RJ-45)

537115499.name: Asus Vivobook 15 OLED (M1505YA-L1238) – AMD Ryzen 7 7730U, 16 GB DDR4 RAM, 512 GB SSD, AMD Radeon Graphics, 15.6″ FHD OLED Display, Windows 11

details.description_text: Powerful AMD Ryzen 7 7730U processor (8 cores, 16 threads, up to 4.5 GHz boost) 16 GB DDR4 RAM (8 GB onboard + 8 GB slot, dual-channel) for smooth multitasking Fast and spacious 512 GB PCIe NVMe SSD storage Stunning 15.6″ Full HD OLED display with rich colors, deep blacks, and quick 0.2 ms response Integrated AMD Radeon Graphics for everyday visuals and light creative work Modern connectivity: USB‑C, USB‑A, HDMI, combo audio jack, DC-in Features backlit keyboard, fingerprint sensor, privacy-shutter webcam, and SonicMaster audio Lightweight design, around 1.70 kg, ideal for work or study on the go Advanced wireless with Wi‑Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3 Durable build tested to MIL‑STD‑810H standards The Asus Vivobook 15 OLED (M1505YA-L1238) is designed to deliver a premium visual experience alongside solid everyday performance. Powered by the AMD Ryzen 7 7730U, this laptop handles multitasking, office work, streaming, and creative tasks with ease. With 16 GB of DDR4 RAM in dual-channel and a 512 GB PCIe SSD, it boots quickly and keeps apps running smoothly.The centerpiece is its 15.6-inch Full HD OLED display, offering brilliant contrast, vibrant colors, and a fast 0.2 ms response time, making it perfect for both work and entertainment. The integrated AMD Radeon Graphics manages daily graphics needs effortlessly. Additional features like the backlit keyboard, fingerprint login, privacy shutter on the webcam, and SonicMaster-tuned speakers improve usability.Connectivity is comprehensive, including USB-C, USB-A, HDMI, audio jack, and modern wireless standards like Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3. Built to last with MIL‑STD‑810H certification, and weighing only around 1.70 kg, this laptop is a balanced choice for professionals, students, and anyone who values style, portability, and vivid display quality.

537123446.name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 5i 14IMH9 (83DA008BLK) Intel Core Ultra 5 125H 16GB RAM 512GB SSD 14.0-inch OLED Laptop

details.description_text: Certifications: MIL-STD-810H military Test Passed Processor: Intel Core Ultra 5 125H RAM & Storage: 16GB Soldered LPDDR5x Memory, 512GB M.2 PCIe 4.0x4 NVMe SSD Graphics: Integrated Intel Arc Graphics Display: 14.0-inch WUXGA (1920x1200) OLED The Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 5i 14IMH9 (83DA008BLK) is a sleek and powerful ultrabook designed for both productivity and entertainment. Powered by the latest Intel Core Ultra 5 125H processor and equipped with 16GB LPDDR5x RAM as well as a spacious 1TB PCIe Gen4 SSD, this laptop ensures seamless multitasking and rapid data access. Enjoy stunning visuals on the vivid 14-inch 2.2K IPS display with anti-glare technology, 100% sRGB color, and 300 nits brightness for excellent clarity whether indoors or out. The integrated Intel graphics provide efficient performance for everyday tasks. Weighing just 1.46kg, the ultra-slim form factor makes it highly portable. Connectivity is robust with Wi-Fi 6E, Bluetooth 5.2, USB Type-C, Type-A, HDMI, and a microSD card reader. Enhanced security features include a fingerprint reader and camera privacy shutter, while stereo speakers with Dolby Audio deliver immersive sound. Pre-installed with Windows 11 Home, the IdeaPad Slim 5i 14IMH9 is perfect for users seeking a modern, high-performing laptop for work, study, or entertainment.

546761131.name: HP PROBOOK 440 G10 Intel® Core™ i7 1355U 13th Generation 16GB DDR4 512GB SSD I FP THUNDERBOLT US ENG 14 Inch FULL HD

details.description_text: ● Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-1355U (13th Gen, up to 5.0 GHz with Intel Turbo Boost, 10 cores / 12 threads, 12 MB L3 cache) ● Graphics: Integrated Intel® UHD Graphics (Iris Xe with dual-channel RAM) ● Memory: 16 GB DDR4-3200 MT/s (1×16 GB), 2 SODIMM slots (expandable) ● Storage: 512 GB PCIe® NVMe™ SSD ● Display: 14″ FHD (1920×1080), IPS, narrow bezel, anti-glare, approx. 250 nits brightness, 45 % NTSC ● Operating System: FreeDOS (no OS pre-installed)● Connectivity: ○ Intel® Wi-Fi 6E (2×2) & Bluetooth® 5.3 ○ RJ-45 Gigabit Ethernet port Accelerator● Ports: ○ 2× USB-C (10 Gbps, Thunderbolt-capable, DisplayPort 2.1, PD) ○ 2× USB-A (one with charging support) ○ 1× HDMI 2.1 ○ 1× 3.5 mm combo audio jack ○ 1× AC power input ○ 1× RJ-45 Ethernet Geizhals● Security Features: ○ Fingerprint reader ○ Optional TPM, chassis intrusion sensor, Kensington nano lock slot (depending on SKU) Accelerator● Keyboard & Input: ○ Backlit full-size US English keyboard (spill-resistant) ○ Clickpad with multi-touch gesture support Geizhals● Camera & Audio: ○ 720p HD webcam (optional privacy shutter) ○ Dual-array microphones ○ Dual stereo speakers GeizhalsAccelerator● Battery: 3-cell, ~51 Wh Li-ion polymer battery (estimated runtime up to ~11.5 h) Accelerator● Dimensions & Weight: ~32.19 × 21.39 × 1.99 cm; starts at ~1.38 kg (with charger excluded) ● Color: Silver● Security Software Suite: Includes HP Sure Click, Sure Sense, Sure Recover, Privacy Settings, QuickDrop, and other business management tools (exact bundle depends on the SKU)The HP ProBook 440 G10 (i7-1355U) is a premium business laptop crafted for professionals who demand performance and security in a mobile package. Powered by the 13th-gen Intel® Core™ i7-1355U processor and backed by 16 GB DDR4 RAM and a 512 GB NVMe SSD, it delivers snappy multitasking and quick responsiveness. The crisp 14″ Full HD IPS display, backlit keyboard, fingerprint reader, and Thunderbolt-enabled USB-C ports enhance usability and flexibility. Designed for modern workflows, it includes Gigabit Ethernet, robust security layers, and efficient FreeDOS configuration—giving you the freedom to install your preferred OS. Sleek in Pike Silver and lightweight (~1.38 kg), it’s tailored for productivity on the move.Technical Specifications Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-1355U (13th Gen, up to 5.0 GHz with Intel Turbo Boost, 10 cores / 12 threads, 12 MB L3 cache) Graphics: Integrated Intel® UHD Graphics (Iris Xe with dual-channel RAM) Memory: 16 GB DDR4-3200 MT/s (1×16 GB), 2 SODIMM slots (expandable) Storage: 512 GB PCIe® NVMe™ SSD Display: 14″ FHD (1920×1080), IPS, narrow bezel, anti-glare, approx. 250 nits brightness, 45 % NTSC Operating System: FreeDOS (no OS pre-installed)Connectivity:Intel® Wi-Fi 6E (2×2) & Bluetooth® 5.3 RJ-45 Gigabit Ethernet port AcceleratorPorts:2× USB-C (10 Gbps, Thunderbolt-capable, DisplayPort 2.1, PD)2× USB-A (one with charging support)1× HDMI 2.11× 3.5 mm combo audio jack1× AC power input1× RJ-45 Ethernet GeizhalsSecurity Features:Fingerprint readerOptional TPM, chassis intrusion sensor, Kensington nano lock slot (depending on SKU) AcceleratorKeyboard & Input:Backlit full-size US English keyboard (spill-resistant)Clickpad with multi-touch gesture support GeizhalsCamera & Audio:720p HD webcam (optional privacy shutter)Dual-array microphonesDual stereo speakers GeizhalsAcceleratorBattery: 3-cell, ~51 Wh Li-ion polymer battery (estimated runtime up to ~11.5 h) AcceleratorDimensions & Weight: ~32.19 × 21.39 × 1.99 cm; starts at ~1.38 kg (with charger excluded) Color: Silver Security Software Suite: Includes HP Sure Click, Sure Sense, Sure Recover, Privacy Settings, QuickDrop, and other business management tools (exact bundle depends on the SKU)

536020954.name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 5i 14IRH10 (83HR0088IN) 13th Gen Core i5-13420H 16GB RAM 512GB SSD 14.0-inch OLED Laptop

details.description_text: 13th Gen Intel Core i5-13500H Processor (up to 4.70 GHz, 12 Cores, 16 Threads) 16GB LPDDR5 RAM, 512GB PCIe Gen4 NVMe SSD 14-inch 2.2K (2240 x 1400) IPS, 100% sRGB, Anti-glare Display Integrated Intel Iris Xe Graphics Lightweight (1.46 kg) and ultra-portable Storm Grey design Comprehensive connectivity: USB-C, USB-A, HDMI, microSD Card Reader, Headphone/Mic Combo Full-size backlit keyboard, fingerprint sensor for security Pre-installed Windows 11 Home The Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 5i 14IRH10 83HR0088IN is a masterfully crafted laptop, perfect for users seeking both performance and premium portability. Powered by the advanced 13th Gen Intel Core i5-13500H processor and a robust 16GB LPDDR5 RAM, it ensures seamless multitasking, faster responsiveness, and efficient performance for demanding workloads. The 512GB PCIe Gen4 NVMe SSD offers rapid boot times and generous storage for all your files, while the integrated Intel Iris Xe Graphics delivers vibrant visuals and smooth graphics performance. Its 14-inch 2.2K IPS display covers 100% sRGB color space, providing sharp, color-accurate visuals and an immersive viewing experience, complemented by an anti-glare finish for comfortable use in all lighting conditions. The ultra-slim, ultra-light Storm Grey chassis weighs only 1.46 kg, making it ideal for on-the-go professionals and students. Multiple I/O ports including USB-C, HDMI, USB-A, microSD card reader, and audio combo jack offer versatile connectivity. Enhanced with a full-size backlit keyboard and a fingerprint reader, this laptop is as functional and secure as it is stylish.
